entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023
